mapper.select: SELECT push_date, track_no_date, fulfillment_date, delivery_sts, tracking_no, wsp_name FROM sales_order WHERE sao_id=#{saoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_order (brd_id, pro_id, dsr_id, price, product_amount, order_sts, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (#{brdId}, #{proId}, #{dsrId}, #{price}, #{productAmount}, "1", now(), now())
